# 'ion' Dialect

_A trapped ions dialect with value semantics._

The ion dialect extends core MLIR with the necessary types and operations to form
the IR for trapped ions quantum computers.

## Types

### IonType

_A value-semantic ion._

Syntax: `!ion.ion`


### PulseType

_A type representing a pulse specifications._

Syntax: `!ion.pulse`
